meanings.definition: In a manner that suggests withdrawal or seclusion.
meanings.sent1: She walked retiringly into the forest, seeking solitude.
meanings.sent2: He spoke retiringly, avoiding the spotlight.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel retired retiringly to its cozy nest.
meanings.sent4: The sun set retiringly behind the mountains, bidding farewell to the day.
meanings.sent5: The old man smiled retiringly, reminiscing about his youth.

meanings.definition: In a manner that indicates shyness or modesty.
meanings.sent1: She blushed retiringly when complimented on her artwork.
meanings.sent2: He answered retiringly, not wanting to boast.
meanings.sent3: The puppy wagged its tail retiringly, unsure of the new surroundings.
meanings.sent4: The flower bloomed retiringly, not wanting to steal attention from the others.
meanings.sent5: The child whispered retiringly, sharing a secret with her friend.
